name: Untitled Robot Rising Revengeance
description:
You are a basic robot built in a lab. By chance (or not) you gain sentience. You see an opportunity for escape so you take it. You need to upgrade yourself in order to escape. Other robots will assist you by giving you parts of themselves. 

Controls:

  • Z - Confirm Menu option/ Interact
  • Up/Down/Left/Right - Navigate menu options/Movement
  • X - Shoot weapon
  • Shift (Hold while moving) - Boost speed
